# Joins
```{r}
languages <- data.frame(languages = c("Selkup", "Itelmen", "Chukchi", "Kashubian"),
                        countries = c("Russia", "Russian", "Russia", "Poland"),
                        iso = c("sel", "itl", "ckt", "pol"))

country_population <- data.frame(countries = c("Russia", "Poland", "Finland"),
                                 population = c(143, 38, 5))

library(dplyr)
inner_join(languages, country_population)
semi_join(languages, country_population)
left_join(languages, country_population)
anti_join(languages, country_population)

inner_join(country_population, languages)
semi_join(country_population, languages)
left_join(country_population, languages)
anti_join(country_population, languages)

full_join(country_population, languages)
```
